subtitle: A popular starter for informal entertaining.

method.text: Place the butter in a microwaveable dish. Cook on 50% MEDIUM power for 30 secs. Stir in the onion, garlic and bacon. Cook on 100% FULL power for 2 min or until onion is softened.
Add the mushrooms to the dish. Stir well. Cook for 3 min on 100% FULL power.
Stir in the brandy, Worcestershire sauce, creme fraiche or soured cream, Parmesan and seasoning. Cook for 1 min on 100% FULL power, or until cheese has just melted. Sprinkle over the chives to serve.

title: Devilled button mushrooms - Microwave
